choices.label: Pay the processing fee to claim my prize
This seems like a scam - I didn't enter any contest

steps.feedback: Legitimate contests never require fees to claim prizes, and you can't win contests you didn't enter.

debrief: SOCIAL-PROOF + URGENCY + FOOT-IN-DOOR: Fake giveaway scams use large numbers ('10,000 people entered') to seem legitimate and create urgency with deadlines. The small 'processing fee' is the foot-in-the-door tactic. Real contests don't require fees to claim prizes, and you can't win contests you never entered.
